solution_line_template: Since Zoe's grandma gave her some money toward her trip, she needs to come up with ${trip_cost} - ${grandma_contribution} = $<<{trip_cost}-{grandma_contribution}={amount_needed}>>{amount_needed}.
This means she must sell ${amount_needed} / ${earnings_per_bar}/candy bar = <<{amount_needed}/{earnings_per_bar}={num_candy_bars}>>{num_candy_bars} candy bars.
